When Your Mind is Racing

April 8, 2019

Author: Bianca Yang
Email: ipacifics@gmail.com

Go outside and lay on the grass or take a walk. Choose a nice, calm area to recuperate in.

Listen to your body and take care of yourself.

Do not surrender your mind and sanity to a pace that you cannot keep up with.
